getStarted.responseText:
Hi!

Welcome to the Official Delhi Daredevils Facebook Page. We represent the glorious city of Delhi. The name, Delhi Daredevils, demonstrates the passion, fighting spirit and dynamism of the region and its people. ЁЯПП ЁЯПЖ
